description: The CWS file allows you to protect your songs, disable copying and printing functions, block editing or saving capabilities, embed a link to your member profile on the ChordWizard network, and lock song credits. CWS files can also be uploaded to the ChordWizard network and shared with other members.
To create a CWS file, select File â†’ Save Song or Save Song As... .
NOTE: Songtrix is available in bronze, silver, and gold editions, which are geared towards beginner, intermediate, and advanced users.
